duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service and actively engage with customers in a professional and friendly manner.
Utilize suggestive selling techniques and meet or exceed solicitation goals for customer rewards programs.
Utilize digital technology and mobile devices to enhance the customer shopping experience.
Meet or exceed personal sales goals and recommend products to increase units sold per transaction.
Maintain store appearance and standards, support operations team, and follow store procedures and policies.
Accept additional duties or responsibilities as requested by Sales Team Manager.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred
